tool_description: Formats complete journal entries by combining text, timestamps, metadata, and styling into structured output formats.

entry_text.description: The validated journal entry text content

metadata_tags.description: Metadata tags to include with the entry

mood_tags.description: Mood tags to include with the entry

output_format.description: Output format: markdown, html, plain_text, json

include_statistics.description: Whether to include word count statistics

entry_title.description: Optional title for the journal entry

error_messages: Empty entry text: Provide non-empty text content for formatting.
Invalid timestamp format: Use ISO 8601 format for timestamp parameter.
Invalid output format: Use one of [markdown, html, plain_text, json].
Invalid template style: Use one of [minimal, standard, detailed].
Metadata format error: Provide tags as arrays of strings.
usage: Provide entry_text and timestamp as required parameters. Add metadata_tags and mood_tags for enhanced entries. Set output_format and template_style to customize appearance. Returns fully formatted journal entry.

entry_id.description: Unique identifier for the journal entry

format_type.description: The output format used for the entry

creation_timestamp.description: When the formatted entry was created
